@preconcurrency
convenience init(
    machService: String,
    targetQueue: DispatchQueue? = nil,
    options: XPCSession.InitializationOptions = .none,
    requirement: XPCPeerRequirement,
    incomingMessageHandler: ((XPCDictionary) -> XPCDictionary?)? = nil,
    cancellationHandler: ((XPCRichError) -> Void)? = nil
) throws
